extension.valueString: Do the next specification in parallel with this one (unless otherwise constrained by the following fields: TQ1-7-start date/time and TQ1-8-end date/time).  The conjunction of "A" specifies two parallel instructions, as are sometimes used in medication, e.

It will be followed by a completion time for the service.  This code allows one to distinguish between the time and priority at which a service should be actuated (e.g. blood should be drawn) and the time and priority at which a service should be complet

Do the next specification after this one (unless otherwise constrained by the following fields: TQ1-7-start date/time and TQ1-8-end date/time). An "S" specification implies that the second timing sequence follows the first, e.g. when a service request is

description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0472 ( TQ Conjunction ID)
name: v2 TQ Conjunction ID

text.div:
TQ Conjunction ID

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
a AsynchronousDo the next specification in parallel with this one (unless otherwise constrained by the following fields: TQ1-7-start date/time and TQ1-8-end date/time). The conjunction of "A" specifies two parallel instructions, as are sometimes used in medication, e.added v2.4
c Actuation TimeIt will be followed by a completion time for the service. This code allows one to distinguish between the time and priority at which a service should be actuated (e.g. blood should be drawn) and the time and priority at which a service should be completadded v2.4
s SynchronousDo the next specification after this one (unless otherwise constrained by the following fields: TQ1-7-start date/time and TQ1-8-end date/time). An "S" specification implies that the second timing sequence follows the first, e.g. when a service request isadded v2.4
